label: Lis, Jerzy A. & Barbara Lis.  2016. Chilocoris serratus n. sp., the first burrower bug species (Hemiptera:  Heteroptera: Cydnidae) recorded in Guinea-Bissau with an annotated checklist of the Afrotropical species of the genus Chilocoris Mayr, 1865. Zootaxa 4103(4): 383–389.
